title: Exploring Hybrid Seawater Electrolysis with Anodic Oxidation Reactions (AORs): Recent Progress and Prospect
content:
Sustainable Energy Fuels, 2024, Accepted Manuscript
DOI: 10.1039/D4SE01191K, Review Article
Baghendra Singh, Ayusie Goyal, Shalini Verma, Labham Singh, Apparao Draksharapu
The major obstacle in electrocatalytic seawater splitting (ESS) is the electro-oxidation of dissolved ions at the anode, which causes significant electrode corrosion and competes with the oxygen evolution reaction (OER),...
